summary: Enhances the basic glass weapon textures to give them more umph!
descriptionHtml:
Enhanced Glass Weapons:
This mod adds more green to the glass texture to make it more glass-like*, and more gold to the metal to make it more lively.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is meant to be used with Enhanced Glass Armor                                          (http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1985)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Installation:
1) Find your skyrim root folder
2) Drag and drop the Data folder into your Skyrim folder
3) Merge the folders
Hope you enjoy this texture, and visit other textures that I have made.

Update! Version 1.1 now
 -Upped the contrast of the weapons
 -Lowered the saturation to match up with my Enhanced Glass Armor mod

Also now supports the nexus mod manager, keeping the older version up since some people liked it better.

[IMG]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/2168-1-1322813454.jpg[/IMG]

Also, feel free to comment, even if you don\'t have much to say!
*changed from definition b/c words carry too many definitions in English
author: Linkcube

files.name: Enhanced Glass Weapons with nmm support
